about.name: Who's this guy?
about.description: I'm a software engineer based in Córdoba, Argentina. I really enjoy the challenges my profession involves. I take it as a great opportunity to continuing growing as a person as well as professional.

company.title: Skills
company.description: I keen on each aspect of building apps from design, develop, test and deliver software in order to accomplish user needs. I like to achieve high-quality websites and exceptional user experience.

knowledgeFields.name: Frontend Development
knowledgeFields.description: I've worked on projects oriented towards the web environment and my skills are broad. I have experience with: React, Redux, Javascript, Html, Css, Sass, Webpack, Parcel, Lerna.

knowledgeFields.name: Backend Development
knowledgeFields.description: I developed software with a wide variety of programming languages, frameworks, libraries, and tools like Java, Spring, EJB, JUnit, JPA, Maven, Elasticsearch, Kibana, Postman, Swagger, Node.

knowledgeFields.name: Continuous Integration
knowledgeFields.description: I've got involved in DevOps and Continuous Integration tasks working with Jenkins, Artifactory, Docker, AWS, SonarQube for Manage product build lifecycle.

members.name: Henry Ford
members.description: Teamwork is so important that it is virtually impossible for you to reach the heights of your capabilities or make the money that you want without becoming very good at it.

members.name: Sophie West
members.description: A group becomes a team when each member is sure enough of himself and his contribution to praise the skill of the others. No one can whistle a symphony. It takes an orchestra to play it.

members.name: Robert Orben
members.description: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team. If you can laugh together, you can work together, silence isn’t golden, it’s deadly.

contact.title: Keep in touch?
contact.textPlaceholder: Tell us your thoughts and feelings...
